# Sound Assets

Place your custom sound files here. Supported formats: mp3, ogg, wav

## Expected Files

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `card-flip.mp3` | Sound when cards are flipped/revealed |
| `card-flick.mp3` | Sound when a card is played to the table |
| `card-deal.mp3` | Sound during card dealing animation |
| `timer-warning.mp3` | Warning beep when timer is low |
| `chat-notification.mp3` | Subtle notification for chat messages |
| `game-start.mp3` | Fanfare when a game begins |
| `victory.mp3` | Victory sound for the winner |
| `defeat.mp3` | Sound for players who lost |
| `trick-win-clean.mp3` | Pleasant chime for winning a trick with no points |
| `trick-win-points.mp3` | Sound for winning a trick with hearts |
| `trick-win-queen.mp3` | Dramatic sound for winning the Queen of Spades |

If any file is missing, the game will use programmatic Web Audio API sounds as fallback.
